00014 typedef struct _CURL_EXT
00015 {
00016         CURL* curl;
00017 
00018         // buffer for storing incoming data
00019         char* inputBuffer;
00020         // counters for that buffer
00021         int inputBufferSize; // size of buffer
00022         int inputBufferFree; // free space in buffer
00023         // buffer for storing sending data
00024         const char* outputBuffer;
00025         // counters for outgoing data
00026         int outputSize; // size of output data
00027         int outputPos; // number of sent bytes
00028         // buffer for storing CURL error messages
00029         char* errorBuffer;
00030 } CURL_EXT;
